data.name: Garlant:My Story
data.detailed_description:
I am an adventurer who graduated from Desolans adventurer college.

Although I have the title of adventurer, I don't have any adventure experience. But I believe that the knowledge I have accumulated will be useful in some ways. After leaving my hometown, I came to the border of the kingdom of Desolans - the Doly region. Here I officially became an adventurer and settled in the town of Garlant in the Doly region, starting to write a new chapter in my life.

If the surrounding threats are not considered, Garlant is a peaceful, peaceful and livable place. Here, what I need is not only to fulfill the obligations of adventurers, but also to integrate into the life of the town and get along with the villagers. In addition, I will make good use of all resources, technologies and capabilities, constantly improve myself, and work with the adventurer guild to bring security and stability to the surrounding areas.

--- ---

Conquer level
Multiple level playing methods and changeable room combinations

Defeat the monster
Monsters, Lords and crystal towers in different forms

Stable area
Multiple different hazardous areas, and take risks to stabilize them

Build equipment
At present, it has 700+ equipment, which can be combined, strengthened and inlaid freely

Manor cultivation
Collect seeds in exploration, various crop planting methods, and automatic planting

Processing and manufacturing
Drawing acquisition, machining and manufacturing

Town life
Complete the entrustment, establish friendship with the townspeople and understand their background stories

--- ---

We will continue to collect the opinions of any player, continue to update the content for free, and create a better Garlant:My Story.

data.short_description: I am an adventurer who just graduated from college. In pursuit of the challenge, I came to the distant border of the Kingdom: the town of Garlant in the Doly region. I will write a new chapter in my life here. It will be a wonderful adventure story.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 Gb dedicated video card, shader model 3.0+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
